    • 方法详细资料

      • findByContent

        java.util.List<QueryResult> findByContent(java.lang.String token,
                                        java.lang.String expression)
                                          throws java.io.IOException,
                                                 ParseException,
                                                 RepositoryException,
                                                 DatabaseException
        Search for documents using it indexed content.
        参数:
        expression - Expression to be searched.
        返回:
        A collection of document which content matched the searched expression.
        抛出:
        RepositoryException - If there is any general repository problem.
        java.io.IOException
        ParseException
        DatabaseException

      • findByName

                                              ParseException,
                                              RepositoryException,
                                              DatabaseException
        Search for documents by document name.

                                           throws java.io.IOException,
                                                  ParseException,
                                                  RepositoryException,
                                                  DatabaseException
        Search for documents using it associated keywords.
        参数:
        expression - Expression to be searched.
        返回:
        A collection of document which keywords matched the searched expression.

        RepositoryException - If there is any general repository problem.

      • find

        java.util.List<QueryResult> find(java.lang.String token,
                               QueryParams params)
                                 throws java.io.IOException,
                                        ParseException,
                                        RepositoryException,
                                        DatabaseException
        Performs a complex search by content, name and keywords (between others).
        参数:
        params - The complex search elements.
        返回:
        A collection of documents.
        抛出:
        RepositoryException - If there is any general repository problem.
        java.io.IOException - If something fails when parsing metadata.
        ParseException
        DatabaseException

      • findPaginated

        ResultSet findPaginated(java.lang.String token,
                      QueryParams params,
                      int offset,
                      int limit)
                        throws java.io.IOException,
                               ParseException,
                               RepositoryException,
                               DatabaseException
        Performs a complex search by content, name and keywords. Paginated version.
        参数:
        params - The complex search elements.
        offset - Query result list offset.
        limit - Query result list limit.
        返回:
        A result set with the total of the results and a collection of document from the resulting query statement.
        抛出:
        RepositoryException - If there is any general repository problem.
        java.io.IOException
        ParseException
        DatabaseException

        long saveSearch(java.lang.String token,
              QueryParams params)
                throws AccessDeniedException,
                       RepositoryException,
                       DatabaseException
        Save a search for future use.
        参数:
        params - The query params.
        name - The name of the query to be saved.
        抛出:
        RepositoryException - If there is any general repository problem or the query fails.
        AccessDeniedException
        DatabaseException

        QueryParams getSearch(java.lang.String token,
                    int qpId)
                      throws PathNotFoundException,
                             RepositoryException,
                             DatabaseException
        Get a saved search.
        参数:
        name - The name of the saved search to retrieve.
        返回:
        The saved search query params.
        抛出:
        RepositoryException - If there is any general repository problem or the query fails.
        PathNotFoundException
        DatabaseException

      • getAllSearchs

                                          throws RepositoryException,
                                                 DatabaseException
        Get all saved search.
        返回:
        A collection with the names of the saved search.
        抛出:
        RepositoryException - If there is any general repository problem or the query fails.
        DatabaseException

      • deleteSearch

        void deleteSearch(java.lang.String token,
                long qpId)
                  throws AccessDeniedException,
                         RepositoryException,
                         DatabaseException
        Delete a saved search.
        参数:
        name - The name of the saved search
        抛出:
        PathNotFoundException - If there is no saved search with this name.
        RepositoryException - If there is any general repository problem or the query fails
        AccessDeniedException
        DatabaseException

      • getKeywordMap

        java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Integer> getKeywordMap(java.lang.String token,
                                                              java.util.List<java.lang.String> filter)
                                                                throws RepositoryException,
                                                                       DatabaseException
        Return a Keyword map. This is a hash with the keywords and the occurrence.
        参数:
        filter - A collection of keywords used to obtain the related document keywords.
        返回:
        The keyword map.
        抛出:
        RepositoryException - If there is any general repository problem or the query fails.
        DatabaseException

      • findSimpleQuery

        java.util.List<QueryResult> findSimpleQuery(java.lang.String token,
                                          java.lang.String statement)
                                            throws RepositoryException,
                                                   DatabaseException
        Performs a simple search using on GQL language.
        参数:
        statement - The simple search in GQL language.
        返回:
        A collection of documents.
        抛出:
        RepositoryException - If there is any general repository problem.
        DatabaseException
        另请参阅:
        http://jackrabbit.apache.org/api/1.6/org/apache/jackrabbit/commons/query/GQL.html

      • findSimpleQueryPaginated

        ResultSet findSimpleQueryPaginated(java.lang.String token,
                                 java.lang.String statement,
                                 int offset,
                                 int limit)
                                   throws RepositoryException,
                                          DatabaseException
        Performs a simple search using GQL languahe. Paginated version.
        参数:
        statement - The simple search in GQL language.
        offset - Query result list offset.
        limit - Query result list limit.
        返回:
        A result set with the total of the results and a collection of document from the resulting query statement.
        抛出:
        RepositoryException - If there is any general repository problem.
        DatabaseException
        另请参阅:
        http://jackrabbit.apache.org/api/1.6/org/apache/jackrabbit/commons/query/GQL.html

      • findMoreLikeThis

        ResultSet findMoreLikeThis(java.lang.String token,
                         java.lang.String uuid,
                         int maxResults)
                           throws RepositoryException,
                                  DatabaseException
        Find documents like a given one.
        参数:
        uuid - Uuid of the document to find other similar.
        maxResults - Maximum number of returned documents.
        返回:
        A result set with the total of the results and a collection of document from the resulting query statement.
        抛出:
        RepositoryException - If there is any general repository problem.
        DatabaseException
